Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Requires certain engineering plans that could pose a material risk to public safety to bear a stamp of approval of a professional engineer
Summary: Requires certain engineering plans or specifications for engineering work or services that could pose a material risk to public safety to bear a stamp of approval of a professional engineer and authorizes the public service commission to promulgate rules and regulations relating to such requirement.
LawCode: Amd ยง7208, add ยง7213, Ed L; amd ยง5, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public service law, in relation to certain engineering plans or specifications for engineering work or services that could pose a material risk to public safety
